Message.Title: Why do we need three CEO's to work on the first Guy's plan
Message.Msg: I reviewed the recent presentation from 6/6/13. Basically, it is the same plan, as we have seen numerous times. Looks like Idzik is another chicken CEO that does not put any dates or interim steps in his plan. The ultimate goal is to make 1 Billion in earnings., yada, yada, yada............ Is that in 5, 10, or 20 years ?????? Not a one of these loser CEO's will tell us what kind of reductions or earnings we can expect in 2013, forget the ultimate!!!! I am not saying the plan is bad. I am not saying they are not executing on the plan. I am asking why we need to hire, fire and provide 3 CEO's with golden parachutes to execute the plan while shareholders pay the tab????????

Message.Title: ETFC Is Going All The Way Up To $120.00 Per Share. Here's Why:
Message.Msg: I ran my trajectory model and this is what it's saying. Position yourselves accordingly. &Happy investing to all. Closed at $11.76 today, Friday June 7th 2013.

Topic.Title: Turn off your Verizon phone if you are having an affair
Turn off your Verizon phone if you are having an affair

Message.Msg: This program doesn't record calls, only the endpoints, the originator, and the duration of the calls. Further it mostly looks for patterns, so unless you have a pattern of calling your mistress in Saudi Arabia every day each week at a certain time, don't sweat it.

Topic.Title: ETFC Is Going All The Way Up To $120.00 Per Share. Here's Why:

Message.Msg: uh, no . . . not within a 5 year time frame anyway. I consider a 5 year timeframe about as far in the future as I care to speculate on stocks. Let's get up to $24-$30 range then see where we are.

Topic.Title: Bible Thumpers are WRONG About the Bible !

Message.Msg: Erm, ahh, did it ever occur to you that EVERY group of Thumpers thinks every OTHER group of Thumpers is wrong about [fill in what they're thumping] and therefore are damned. That must mean you're a Thumper also, and therefore, by Thumper logic, are also doomed to a warm repose. Thump Thump, Thump Thump. The Telltale Thump.

Topic.Title: Beck: "I wish I could take back everything I said"

Message.Msg: I wonder if Ayers has ever made any public statement apologizing for being a terrorist? Big difference and yet Ayers is PROUD of his time with the Weather Underground. So either he's deluded, or he was an FBI CI (which would explain quite a bit actually).

Topic.Title: Beck: "I wish I could take back everything I said"

Message.Msg: OK, look at it this way, for whatever reason one of the BIGGEST idiots on television or radio has decided he MIGHT have gone alittle overboard, and is sort of attempting to apologize (sort of). Hey, it's a start.

The only semi-credible attempt on Obama turned out to be a scorned wife trying to get her Husband sent away for life, so to do so she manufactured biological weapons (WMD) and then attempted to assassinate The President. Men, do NOT get some women made at you, they CAN go to extremes!!

Oh she tried to nail another couple guys too, but they're small potatoes. She made ricin, which is frankly SO easy to do that I'm surprised it's illegal, just EXTREMELY stupid since those who fail to take precautions inevitably poison themselves.

Topic.Title: Beck: "I wish I could take back everything I said"

Message.Msg: Just for the record, seeing how you always bring up race in every thing...what group would you fall in? We are talking race here, not sexual orientation.

Topic.Title: Turn off your Verizon phone if you are having an affair

Message.Msg: I've had a chat with someone who's spent some time with her. From what's described of her personality, I'll pass, but I will send along one of his quotes describing her: "The most racist person I've ever met".
gerbil, Congress needs to impeach itself!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
